title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 11 - Order to show cause (removal of child from adoptive home)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 11 - Order to show cause (removal of child from adoptive home)

State Regulations
D.R.L. ยง 116(2) Form 11
(Order to Show Cause

Removal of Child from

Adoptive Home
12/97

At a term of the Surrogate's Court of
the

State of New York, held in and for
the

County of, at, New York, on. P R E S E N T
Hon. Judge
________
In the Matter of the Adoption of
(Docket)(File) No. A Child Whose First Name Is
ORDER TO SHOW
CAUSE (Removal
of Child from

Adoptive Home)
________
UPON reading and filing the report dated, 19 of, the investigator designated by an order of this Court to examine into
the allegations set forth in the petition herein; it is
ORDERED THAT, the petitioner(s) herein show cause
before this Court at, New York, on the day of, 19 at o'clock in the noon of
that day or as soon thereafter as counsel can be heard why an order should not
be granted removing, the above-named adoptive child, from the
home of
(iv), CPLR 315 (Order of

Publication

Form 11 page 2
ORDERED that service of a copy of this
order (and the report upon which it was granted) upon the persons above-named
(and upon
and), personally within the State of New

York on or before the day of, 19, be deemed sufficient service. Dated, 19. ENTER
______________
(SURROGATE)
